Literature.Title: A bioinspired peptide scaffold with high antibiotic activity and low in vivo toxicity.
Literature.Author: Rabanal F, Grau-Campistany A, Vila-Farres X, Gonzalez-Linares J, Borràs M, Vila J, Manresa A, Cajal Y

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 6538(MIC=2µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 9027(MIC=1µg/ml),Escherichia coli ATCC 8739(MIC=4µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 29213(MIC=1µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus SAU.278(MIC=2µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 43300(MIC=1µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus SAU.1616(MIC=8µg/ml),Enterococcus faecalis ATCC 29212(MIC=2-4µg/ml),Escherichia coli NDM-1(MIC=0.5µg/ml),Escherichia coli(MIC=1µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa(MIC=2µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa 38a(MIC=1µg/ml)
